channel.title: What is your favorite Video game/series of video games?
channel.description:
What is your favorite Video game/series of video games?
My favorites are 1. Myst series 2. Legend of Zelda series 3. Metroid series 4. Mario series 5. Empire Earth II The art of Supremacy 6. Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic II The Sith Lords 7. Sonic Series for Sega Genisis 8. The Prince of Persia the Two Thrones 9. Dark Cloud 1 10. Worms: Armageddon

item.title: What is your favorite Video game/series of video games?
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

I too was a Final Fantasy fan. Up to and not including FFVII (the first released on ps1) then they all went to hell. This is of course my opinion and I don’t see many people agreeing with me since the first was released in 1990, making it older than about 85% of this forum.

But I would say my all time favorite was Shadowrun on the SNES. For a somewhat recent favorite: Dungeon Seige 1.

I also rather enjoyed the Dragon Warrior series on NES.

Read full topic

item.title: What is your favorite Video game/series of video games?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Myth, the best series and best game.

Incidentally, has a graphics system somewhat similar (from a technical, not a visual) standpoint close to Runescape, in that it’s a 3D game with 2D sprites.
